Package stores

Class InventoryDataStore

java.lang.Object
stores.InventoryDataStore
public class InventoryDataStore extends Object
The InventoryDataStore class is responsible for managing the inventory data. It loads inventory information from a CSV file, provides methods to manipulate inventory items, and saves updated inventory data back to a CSV file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InventoryDataStore()
    Constructs an InventoryDataStore and initializes the inventory list by loading data from a CSV file.

    Sets the inventory list to a new list of inventory items.

    • writeInventoryToCSV

      public void writeInventoryToCSV(String inventoryCsvPath)
      Writes the current inventory data to a specified CSV file.
      Parameters:
      inventoryCsvPath - the path to the CSV file where inventory data will be saved

    • getLowStockInventory

      public List<Inventory> getLowStockInventory()
      Retrieves a list of inventory items with stock levels below or equal to the low-level alert threshold.
      Returns:
      A list of `Inventory` objects that are low in stock.
